domain.update

Class BasicUpdateProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.update.BasicUpdateSource
      • domain.update.UpdateSource
        • domain.update.BasicUpdateProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBasicObserver, IBasicUpdateProcessor, IBasicUpdateSource, IUpdateSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PromotionObserver, UpdateProcessor

    public abstract class BasicUpdateProcessor
extends UpdateSource
implements IBasicUpdateProcessor
    A convenient, basic implementation of IBasicUpdateProcessor. Note that this class extends UpdateSource instead of BasicUpdateSource. This allows the class to only subscribe to basic events, but still emit all events.
